tweet: Today IOHK releases Plutus Platform, a smart contracts language for the Cardano blockchain. You can try out Plutus online via Plutus Playground. Read the blog to learn about Plutus, the Playground and other supporting documentation:  https://t.co/LRDIM4z9xI

Plutus Playgrounds are live!  https://t.co/9iHUzWX9nS You can use them to write and explore contract applications for the #Plutus platform developed by @InputOutputHK for #Cardano  https://t.co/eupUZBg2Y1

PlutusFest is finally here! Today, we will have a full day of presentations with IOHK’s scientists and engineers about Plutus and Marlowe, programming languages for smart contracts on the Cardano blockchain. Follow along with us on our livestream link here  https://t.co/qZh3OcdEfn

Emurgo has issued a joint release with Metaps+ for the launch of $ADA in their platform! Check out our announcement for the press release. #Cardano #Emurgo #ADAmetapscard @Metaps_PR @seungyeonkim    https://t.co/nnXY8ksUU2

Jann Müller, IOHK functional compiler engineer, joins Michael on stage at PlutusFest to show the attendees examples using the Plutus Playground. And if you haven’t already, check out IOHK’s blog post about Plutus here:  https://t.co/LRDIM4z9xI #PlutusFest  https://t.co/RtqrVmp6nt

Marlowe provides a way for professionals in the finance industry with no programming background to generate code and create software products. It is an easy-to-use programming language that enables them to build financial contracts on the blockchain.  #IOHK #PlutusFest #Cardano

Professor Aggelos Kiayias is up next! He is IOHK’s Chief Scientist and talking about the ongoing research at IOHK and about the Blockchain Technology Laboratory, here at the University of Edinburgh. #PlutusFest  https://t.co/iUfw5ZWlEy

Manuel Chakravarty is a language architect with extensive experience in programming languages. He’s presenting about Plutus, a functional programming language based on Haskell that provides a safer and more convenient approach to smart contract and DApp development!  https://t.co/yw9nTjpjbd

Interested in the R&D going on at IOHK? IOHK’s Director of Engineering and Haskell consultant, Duncan Coutts, tells us everything that’s going on! And no fret, we’ll be uploading videos of everyone’s presentation from today after the event. #PlutusFest  https://t.co/44Rt0PLP5Y

Manuel Chakravarty is a language architect with extensive experience in programming languages. He’s presenting about Plutus, a functional programming language based on Haskell that provides a safer and more convenient approach to smart contract and DApp development!

Rebecca Valentine, Team Plutus Manager at IOHK, gives us the closing remarks to the inaugural PlutusFest. We would like to thank everyone who came out and to anyone else who joined us online! #PlutusFest  https://t.co/giW7VYN5Cs

We’re starting PlutusFest off with an introduction and welcome by Philip Wadler, who is a senior research fellow at IOHK. Follow along with his presentation on our livestream link:  https://t.co/qZh3OcdEfn #PlutusFest  https://t.co/jrkzfWqX7s

Michael Peyton-Jones, IOHK functional compiler engineer, is speaking to the crowd about the Plutus Playground. This is a full testbed for anyone wishing to learn and play around with the Plutus system. Learn more through the Playground website:  https://t.co/bfDGgunjWn #PlutusFest  https://t.co/bm8VEFf8EY

We’re back from our quick break! And check out these beautiful napkins that fit the operational semantics of Plutus! And to get kicked off again, here’s our new livestream link:  https://t.co/wC0ULukUkv #PlutusFest
Here's a new link for our livestream at PlutusFest:  https://t.co/L3hDQ706fG We will also be uploading a video after the event for anyone who missed it! #PlutusFest
PlutusFest is now taking a break for lunch! Thank you to everyone who has joined in so far. We’ll be back at 2:00PM GMT. The full schedule can be found here:  https://t.co/dDfDUHmbkd #PlutusFest

PlutusFest has been off to a great start! Now we’re learning about Marlowe from Simon Thompson, Professor of Logic and Computation at the University of Kent. Marlowe is a domain-specific language designed for the financial industries. #PlutusFest  https://t.co/BIDrJYFPt1

Up next is PlustusFest’s keynote address by Charles Hoskinson, IOHK’s CEO and Co-Founder! You can watch his presentation through our livestream link here:  https://t.co/qZh3OcdEfn There will also be a video uploaded after the event! #PlutusFest  https://t.co/DMSCpZ3otZ
We’re back and live at PlutusFest! Follow along with this afternoon’s presentations on our livestream here:  https://t.co/gmTUsHhZ5t #PlutusFest

Check out the full-length video of #ADAmetapscard being used in Ashley buffet and Magnum ice cream shop in Seoul.  #Cardano #Emurgo @Metaps_PR @seungyeonkim Check the video here!!!   https://t.co/cVjgxRqe0t  https://t.co/gS06Y4GEEB

Marlowe opens up the use of Cardano smart contracts directly to non-programmers in banks and other businesses, who can now automate financial transactions using #cryptocurrency technology to save time and reduce costs. @Cardano   #PlutusFest #Cardano #IOHK
If you would like one of the #PlutusFest merchandise, head over to @CryptoSupreme18 and check it out:   https://t.co/cioi0zVZHS #IOHK #Cardano  https://t.co/gDLgQV2iwm

Marlowe is being announced at the PlutusFest so that businesses can prepare financial smart contracts and products in time for the full release of the Cardano blockchain in 2019. @Cardano   #PlutusFest #Cardano
https://t.co/0tSwa1gvR3 | Metaps+ and @EMURGO_io launch prepaid #Cardano $ADA card in South Korea #cryptocurrency

Plutus and Marlowe bring the rigour and safety of functional programming to smart contracts on Cardano.   We are proud to present Plutus and Marlowe to the world at the inaugural IOHK #PlutusFest today.  #Cardano #CardanoCommunity

Next up is our Director of Engineering Duncan Coutts, speaking about the importance of high assurance software from R&D at IOHK. You can also follow along on the @Cardano community livestream here:  https://t.co/IVn3abwGHD  #PlutusFest #Cardano  https://t.co/RKlkTpFmpD
Check out our latest blog post on Marlowe: financial contracts on blockchain via Simon Thompson:  https://t.co/YlmIZyAfuf #PlutusFest #IOHK #Cardano
It's wonderful to meet the community! We have the @CardanoEffect podcast team with community members doing a livestream at #PlutusFest. @emurgo_io @Cardano  https://t.co/ggAcoXVTDI

Rebecca Valentine, Team Plutus Manager concludes #PlutusFest with her closing remarks for all of the attendees today.   We can't wait to see what you build with Cardano!  #Cardano #blockchaintechnology  https://t.co/uhhuwhgLjV
